title: Python Programming Basics
content: Learn Python programming fundamentals including variables, functions, and control structures. Python is a versatile language great for beginners.

title: Data Science with Python
content: Explore data science concepts using Python libraries like pandas, numpy, and matplotlib. Analyze datasets and create visualizations.

title: Web Development Guide
content: Complete guide to web development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Build responsive websites and web applications.

title: Machine Learning Introduction
content: Introduction to machine learning concepts and algorithms. Learn about supervised and unsupervised learning techniques.

title: Database Design Principles
content: Learn fundamental database design principles, normalization, and SQL queries. Design efficient database schemas.

title: Food Safety Guidelines
content: Comprehensive food safety guidelines for restaurants and food service. Proper handling, storage, and preparation techniques.

title: Recipe Collection
content: Collection of popular recipes including appetizers, main dishes, and desserts. Step-by-step cooking instructions.

title: Nutrition Facts Guide
content: Guide to understanding nutrition facts and making healthy food choices. Information about vitamins, minerals, and dietary requirements.
